channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL

item.title: Report X-2023081187
item.description:
Report X-2023081187

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was sent up the belt. package was sent down the primary dump chute upside down. The package started to leak from the bottle, inside box from its top. Package was sat up right and isolated. DescribePack: top of box was wet. Bottle inside is wet around the bottle cap. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package was sat up right.

item.title: Report X-2023082059
item.description:
Report X-2023082059

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-28
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on trailer. Package was dropped from off of trailer by package handler. After a while, it was noticed that it was leaking. DescribePack: Package was wet. The box suffered corrosion damage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Bottles inside were sat into a hazardous bin followed by the remains of the box.

item.title: Report X-2023080860
item.description:
Report X-2023080860

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: TUSCALOOSA
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered in unload area and brought to hazmat holding area to quarantine DescribePack: container appears to have been punctured while in transit to destination facility, unknown what caused actual damage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: contents left in container were drained into a hazmat salvage bucket with absorbent to prevent any more liquid being spread.
